pages.text: $(li)The Basalt Deltas is a volcanic biome covered by ashes.$(br)$(li)it can be found in the Nether.$(br)$(li)This biome is composed of mostly of Basalt, Blackstone and Magma Blocks.

$(li)Not too many creatures can survive in this habitat, just the Basalt Giants, Magma Cubes and the Straddlers.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Basalt Deltas$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
